title: Cold Comfort Farm
notes: Took a while to get going, and the main protagonist wasn't that likeable, but came together entertainingly.

title: Time Warped
notes: Great fun and food for thought - huge list of references

title: Epitaph for a Spy
notes: Nicely put together spy work, which met the need for me to read some fiction. Something solid, with a plot. Job done.
